dk.statsbiblioteket.util
Class Zips

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.Zips

@QAInfo(state=QA_NEEDED,
        level=NORMAL)
public class Zips
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to help zipping entire folders and store the zip file on disk.

Method Detail

zip

public static void zip(java.lang.String path,
                       java.lang.String outputFilename,
                       boolean overwrite)
                throws java.io.IOException
Zips a file, or recursively zip a folder, and write the resulting zip file to a given location. This method will create all parent folders necessary for storing the output file.

Parameters:
path - File or folder to zip.
outputFilename - Name of the output zip file.
overwrite - Whether or not to overwrite if the outputFilename already exists.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if error occur while handling files.
FileAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if overwrite is true and outputFilename already exists.

unzip

public static void unzip(java.lang.String zipFilename,
                         java.lang.String outputDir,
                         boolean overwrite)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Unzip a zip file to a target directory.

Parameters:
zipFilename - Path to the zip file to extract.
outputDir - Directory to place output in.
overwrite - Overwrite files.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If error occur when handling files.
FileAlreadyExistsException - If overwrite is true and outpuDir contains a file that would be overwritten by the extraction of the input zip file.

gunzipBuffer

public static byte[] gunzipBuffer(byte[] data)
GZip the contents of a byte array and return a new byte array containing the compressed data.

Parameters:
data - The data to compress.
Returns:
the gzip compressed data.

gzipBuffer

public static byte[] gzipBuffer(byte[] data)
Unzip a gzip compressed byte array of data.

Parameters:
data - The compressed data to gzip.
Returns:
The uncompressed data.

getZipEntry

public static byte[] getZipEntry(java.io.File zipFile,
                                 java.lang.String entryName)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Read the (unzipped) contents of a single zip entry within a zip file.

Parameters:
zipFile - Zip file to read from.
entryName - Name of entry withing the zip file.
Returns:
A byte array with the unpacked data, or null if the entry is not found within the zip file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the zip file.
